name: Ad Free Cornhole Score Keeper
description:
A simple and easy to use score keeper that allows you to focus on the game. Simply scroll up and down the number wheel and tap the add scores button to do the score keeping for you. Focus less on adding scores, and more on having fun winning the game.

Two types of play:
-Over 21
-Exactly 21 with an automatic setback to 15.

Super easy to use with one hand, lots of space between buttons.
